fields.name: Australian GP Champions Club
fields.description: Witness the 2021 Australian Grand Prix at Albert Park in style. Choose an F1 Experiences Ticket Packages to enjoy exclusive benefits such as meet-and-greets with racing legends, Champions Club hospitality, a driving tour of the track and more to compliment your 3-Day race ticket!

fields.name: Australian GP Grandstand Seating
fields.description: Watch all the Formula 1 action from the trackside grandstands of your choice!
